en.name: Leupold D-Evo off-axis 6x20 compact scope (BLK)
en.description: The D-EVO's unique design lets you move between your 1x red dot site and the 6x magnification D-EVO® by simply shifting your eye line–not your head. Now you can quickly move between close-quarter shots and mid-range shots with speed and accuracy.

en.name: Leupold D-Evo off-axis 6x20 compact scope (FDE)
en.description: The D-EVO's unique design lets you move between your 1x red dot site and the 6x magnification D-EVO® by simply shifting your eye line–not your head. Now you can quickly move between close-quarter shots and mid-range shots with speed and accuracy.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA648MGO-M240 6x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The TA648MGO-M240 6x48 ACOG is a Machine Gun Optic (MGO) designed specifically for the M240 weapon system. The MGO provides the shooter enhanced target identification and increased hit probability out to 1200 meters utilizing the Bullet Drop Compensator.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA648MGO-M2 6x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The TA648MGO-M2 6x48 ACOG is a Machine Gun Optic (MGO) designed specifically for the .50 BMG M2 weapon system. The MGO provides the shooter enhanced target identification and increased hit probability out to 2000 meters utilizing the Bullet Drop Compensator.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA648-50 6x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The military’s need for a magnified, self-luminous tactical sight that enhances target identification and increases hit probability on extended-range shots has given rise to the new Trijicon ACOG® 6x48. Powered by Trijicon’s patented fiber optics and tritium-based technology, the new TA648-50 ACOG® reticle features a red chevron aiming point. It also incorporates a bullet drop compensator (BDC) with additional aiming points estimated for trajectory of the .50BMG round out to 1800 meters.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA648-308 6x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The military’s need for a magnified, self-luminous tactical sight that enhances target identification and increases hit probability on extended-range shots has given rise to the new Trijicon ACOG® 6x48. Powered by Trijicon’s patented fiber optics and tritium-based technology, the new TA648-308 ACOG® reticle features a red chevron aiming point.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA648-308H 6x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The military’s need for a magnified, self-luminous tactical sight that enhances target identification and increases hit probability on extended-range shots has given rise to the new Trijicon ACOG® 6x48. Powered by Trijicon’s patented fiber optics and tritium-based technology, the new TA648-308H ACOG® reticle features a red dot aiming point circled by a black "horseshoe." It also incorporates a bullet drop compensator (BDC) with additional aiming points estimated for trajectory of the 7.62mm M80 out to 1200 meters.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA648 6x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The military’s need for a magnified, self-luminous tactical sight that enhances target identification and increases hit probability on extended-range shots has given rise to the new Trijicon ACOG® 6x48. Powered by Trijicon’s patented fiber optics and tritium-based technology, the new TA648 ACOG® reticle features a red chevron aiming point. It also incorporates a bullet drop compensator (BDC) with additional aiming points estimated for trajectory of the 5.56mm M855 out to 800 meters.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG Low Height TA44-C 1.5x16 compact scope
en.description: The Trijicon ACOG 1.5x16S Scope is a fixed magnification riflescope with an illuminated reticle pattern for use in any lighting conditions. Dual illumination provides two sources of battery-free illumination – fiber optics and tritium. The fiber optics use ambient light to automatically adjust the brightness level and contrast of the reticle to available light conditions.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA31-C Amber 4x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The Trijicon ACOG (Advanced Combat Optical Gunsight) is a fixed-power compact riflescope with an illuminated crosshair reticle. It is designed to be extremely durable and reliable. Combining traditional, precise distance marksmanship with CQB speed, this variant includes a bullet-drop compensated (BDC) reticle.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA31H Amber 4x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The Trijicon ACOG (Advanced Combat Optical Gunsight) is a fixed-power compact riflescope with an illuminated horseshoe reticle. It is designed to be extremely durable and reliable. Combining traditional, precise distance marksmanship with CQB speed, this variant includes a bullet-drop compensated (BDC) reticle.

en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA31-C Green 4x32 scope (Black)
en.description: The Trijicon ACOG (Advanced Combat Optical Gunsight) is a fixed-power compact riflescope with an illuminated crosshair reticle. It is designed to be extremely durable and reliable. en.name: Trijicon ACOG TA31H Red 4x32 scope (Tan)
en.description: The Trijicon ACOG (Advanced Combat Optical Gunsight) is a fixed-power compact riflescope with an illuminated horseshoe reticle. It is designed to be extremely durable and reliable. Combining traditional, precise distance marksmanship with CQB speed, this variant includes a bullet-drop compensated (BDC) reticle.

en.name: ELCAN SpecterDR 1.5x/6x scope
en.description: The ELCAN SpecterDR 1.5x/6x Legacy is the second evolution in the family of Dual Role Optical Sights. Based upon the battle-proven SpecterDR design, the SpecterDR 1.5x/6x provides higher magnification to enable greater precision and longer engagement ranges, while at the same time providing exceptional field of view in CQB mode.

en.name: Burris RT-6 1-6x24 30mm riflescope
en.description: Speed reigns supreme in three-gun competition. So if you want  to compete, you better be fast on the target and fast to shoot. Race inspired and tactical strong, the new RT-6™ is built for speed, accuracy and easy handling.

en.name: Vortex Golden Eagle HD 15-60x52 30mm riflescope
en.description: The Golden Eagle HD offers a unique set of features specifically designed for F Class and Bench Rest competition shooters. The 15-60x magnification range, ultra-precise 1/8 MOA adjustments and extremely fine, second focal plane reticle options help maximize precision on known-distance long-range targets.

en.name: Nightforce NXS 3.5-15x50 30mm riflescope
en.description: The Nightforce 3.5-15x50mm riflescope was designed and built to perform in combat. This versatile riflescope provides users with much-needed features and is at home on sniper and special purpose rifles alike.

en.name: Vortex Spitfire HD Gen II 5x Prism Scope
en.description: For shooters who need more reach without sacrificing speed, the Spitfire™ HD Gen II is built to excel at mid-range engagements. Its fixed magnification delivers sharp, accurate shots with its etched-glass reticle that stays visible even without illumination.

en.name: Trijicon Accupower 1-8x28 34mm riflescope
en.description: The Trijicon 1-8x28 AccuPower is the versatile riflescope perfect for competitive, tactical, and sporting applications. This is the optic of choice, whether running and gunning, hitting steel, or staring down dangerous game. A true 1x with 8x optical zoom and a first focal plane reticle, it offers both rapid target engagement and long-range precision.

en.name: Vortex "Eleanor" AMG 1-10x24 34mm riflescope (Black)
en.description: The Eleanor AMG 1-10x24 is a compact, ultra-durable optic built for elite operators, delivering exceptional clarity on short-barreled carbines while preserving rail space for accessories.

en.name: Vortex "Eleanor" AMG 1-10x24 34mm riflescope (FDE)
en.description: The Eleanor AMG 1-10x24 is a compact, ultra-durable optic built for elite operators, delivering exceptional clarity on short-barreled carbines while preserving rail space for accessories.

en.name: Leupold Mark 5HD 5-25x56mm 35mm riflescope (Mil-FDE)
en.description: The Mark 5HD 5-25x56 riflescope is known for being a lighter and more efficient optic than other scopes in its class. Featuring optical glass, full multi-coated lenses and an advanced light management system, the scope offers low-glare, high-contrast imaging. Installed on 35mm ring mounts. Manufactured by Leupold. Flat Dark Earth version.

en.name: Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x28 34mm riflescope
en.description: From close quarters to long-range engagements, the Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24mm incorporates everything military, law enforcement, and professional shooters need into one extremely versatile riflescope.

en.name: Nightforce ATACR F1 1-8x24 34mm riflescope
en.description: From close quarters to long-range engagements, the Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24mm incorporates everything military, law enforcement, and professional shooters need into one extremely versatile riflescope.

en.name: Kahles K624i 6-24x56 34mm riflescope
en.description: The K624i offers unparalleled optical clarity in a small package.
